After that, it was the same sort of exchange at the supermarket.
The whole thing was so awkward that I don't think I can visit that shopping district for a while.
... Well, I guess you could say that was the cute side of catgirls.

店内に積まれたダンボールへと視線を向ける。

She smiled brightly and brought out the invoice along with a pen.
[Kashou]: 「Okay, let's see...」
I looked over the sales invoice I received once more.

I looked over at the pile of boxes inside the bakery.

ModelAnswer:

metadata: [character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
[食器業者]: 「こちらのミスで、別の注文書と混じってしまっていたようでして……」
[食器業者]: 「水無月様の方もすぐにご入用と思いますので……」
[食器業者]: 「もしよろしければ、ご注文分の食器を受け取って頂ければと思うのですが……」
[嘉祥]: 「注文分を受け取れって……」
[嘉祥]: 「……え？　この中からですか？」
そびえ立つダンボールの山。
思わず言葉に詰まる。
どれも一様に同じ箱なわけで。
中身を開けてみるまで何が入っているのか分からない。
しかも伝票を見ればどれも最高級のティーセットや食器。
なので、扱いにも細心の注意を払わないととんでもないことになる。
[嘉祥]: 「あの、確かに開店準備もあるので今日もらえたら嬉しいですけども……」
[嘉祥]: 「……今からこれを全部って、相当時間かかりますよね？」
reference_answer:
[Tableware Seller]: 「Because of an error on our part, it appears that another order got mixed in with yours...」
[Tableware Seller]: 「I imagine that you may be in need of these items right away, Mr. Minaduki...」
[Tableware Seller]: 「So if at all possible, if you would be able to accept this order...」
[Kashou]: 「Accept this order...」
[Kashou]: 「... Huh? From all this?」
The mountain of cardboard boxes towered over everything.
I was at a loss for words.
Every box was of equal size.
I wouldn't know what was inside each of them without opening them up.
On top of that, looking at the sales invoice, I could see that they all contained expensive tea sets and tableware.
And if I accepted it all, it would be a lot of work to deal with all the new items.
[Kashou]: 「Uhm, there's still things that need doing in advance of my bakery's opening, so I don't mind accepting these...」
[Kashou]: 「... but it's going to take a while to deal with all of this.」
ModelAnswer:
[Ceramics Dealer]: "It seems this mistake caused the order form to get mixed in with another one...,"
[Ceramics Dealer]: "...and I think Master Minaduki will need them very soon as well..."
[Ceramics Dealer]: "If it's all right, would you be willing to receive the ceramics for this order?..."
[Kashou]: "To receive the ordered items...?"
[Kashou]: "...Huh? From inside here?"
A mountain of cardboard boxes towers before him.
He can hardly find words.
All the boxes are identical.
There's no way to tell what's inside until they're opened.
And according to the invoices, each one contains a top-tier tea set or other ceramics.
So, if handled carelessly, it could be disastrous.
[Kashou]: "Well, I would certainly appreciate receiving them today since we have opening preparations...,"
[Kashou]: "...but doing this all at once will take quite a while, won't it?"

困ったような笑顔を浮かべて俺を見る。
[時雨]: 「……自分にも頼ってもらえないのは、きっと寂しいことだと思いますよ？」
その笑顔に胸がズキリと痛む。
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Well, it's your own fault our clientele increased so much.」
[Shigure]: 「Oh? Just what might you be talking about?」
I decided not to press further.
Shigure smiled slightly and tilted her head in response.
If she was going to address that issue honestly, she would already have done so by now.
That's how Shigure had always been.
[Shigure]: 「I understand what you are saying, Nii-sama...」
[Shigure]: 「... but catgirls are clever. Clever enough to become family, and even lovers, to humans.」
[Shigure]: 「... And that's exactly why.」
She took a deep breath...
... and looked at me with a kind of troubled smile.
[Shigure]: 「... I think there would be a feeling of sadness to not be relied upon.」
Her smile stabbed at my heart.
ModelAnswer:
[Kashou]: "Thanks to Shigure, we've seen more customers than expected."
[Shigure]: "Huh? What do you mean?"
After deciding not to press the matter further,
Shigure smiled faintly and nodded her head in response.
She would have just said it directly instead of being so indirect like always.
That's just how Shigure has been since long ago.
[Shigure]: "I understand what you mean, master."
[Shigure]: "But cats are smart creatures after all. They can become both a family member and a partner to humans."
[Shigure]: "...And that's why..."
Then she paused for a moment.
She gave me a worried smile and looked at me.
[Shigure]: "...It must be lonely not being able to rely on yourself, isn't it?"
My chest tightened with pain at her smile.

Question:

[時雨]: 「……用件など出ずとも分かります。行き先を告げずに出て来たので」
時雨の手の中の携帯が鳴り止む。
同じように時雨も黙ったまま、
携帯をぎゅっと握り締める。
[時雨]: 「……私がまだ年端もいかぬ女だからですか？」
[時雨]: 「それとも、世間知らずの子どもだからですか？」
[時雨]: 「……だから、私はお父さまとお母さまの言うことに従わねばならないのでしょうか」
[時雨]: 「……私は、ここにいたいのです」
[時雨]: 「兄さまが苦しまれてる時くらい……せめて、お傍にいるだけでも……」
reference_answer:
She looked at her phone and furrowed her brows.
When Shigure just sat there motionlessly, I could pretty much figure out who it was.
[Kashou]: 「It's from home, right? You should answer.」
[Shigure]: 「... I don't need to answer to know what they want. I left without saying where I was going.」
The cell phone in Shigure's hand stopped ringing.
Shigure fell silent...
... and gripped the cell phone tightly.
[Shigure]: 「... Is it because I'm still a young girl?」
[Shigure]: 「... Or is it because I'm naïve to the world?」
[Shigure]: 「... Is that why I must do what mother and father ask of me?」
[Shigure]: 「... I want to be here.」
[Shigure]: 「When Nii-sama is suffering... at the very least, let me be by his side...」
ModelAnswer:
Minaduki Shigure furrows her brows as she looks at her phone screen.  
Observing the unmoving Shigure, Kashou deduces the caller's identity.  
[Kashou]: "It must be from home, right? You should hurry up."  
[Shigure]: "……Even without any explanation of what it is about, I understand. You came out without telling me where you were going."  
The phone in Shigure's hand stops ringing.  
Similarly, Shigure remains silent and tightly grips her phone.  
[Shigure]: "……Is it because I'm still too young?"  
[Shigure]: "Or perhaps because I'm an ignorant child?"  
[Shigure]: "……So, must I always follow what my father and mother say?"  
[Shigure]: "……I want to be here."  
[Shigure]: "Even when brother is suffering… At least just by being beside him…"

reference_answer:
[Vanilla]: 「We don't know any other clinics... and there aren't any people on the street to ask.」
[Vanilla]: 「We can't just go back like this... What should we...」
We gripped each other's hands tightly in worry.
Looking up at the cold shutters, we chewed our lips in concern.
[Police Officer]: 「What are you two doing there?」
[Chocola]: 「Ah... Ms. Policewoman!」
[Chocola]: 「Where's the closest open clinic?!」

[Vanilla]: 「The clinic is closed and we don't know what to do...」

[Chocola&Vanilla]: 「Ah...!」

She grips her hands together tightly in不安 (unease).
She looks up at the cold shutter and bites her lower lip sharply.

[Chocola]: "Ah... officer!"

Question:

[時雨]: 「おはようございます、兄さま」
[時雨]: 「私は今回の一件で色々と考えたのです」
晴れ晴れとした曇りの無い笑顔。
他のネコたちも同じように笑顔を俺に向けている。
つう、と冷たい汗が伝うのを感じながら、
[嘉祥]: 「はぁ……考えたって、何を……？」
何とかそれだけを口にする。
[時雨]: 「今回の一件で、兄さまに無理をするなというのが無理なことがよく分かりました」
[時雨]: 「ですが、私も妹として夜も眠れぬほど心配をさせられたのもまた事実……」
[時雨]: 「ならば人員を増やして、兄さまの負担を減らすのが一番の得策と、時雨は考えたのです」
[嘉祥]: 「…………はぁ」
reference_answer:
The first thing I saw this morning was so unexpected, my brain couldn't process it all.
[Shigure]: 「Good morning, Nii-sama.」
[Shigure]: 「This recent incident has gotten me thinking...」
She wore a sunny smile that no cloud could cover up.
The catgirls looked at me with similar smiles.
I felt myself break out in a cold sweat...
[Kashou]: 「Haah... thinking... about what...?」
I only managed to get out that much.
[Shigure]: 「After that incident, I learned that there's no way to keep Nii-sama from attempting to achieve the impossible.」
[Shigure]: 「However, it's also a fact that his dear little sister -- namely me -- is losing sleep from worrying about him so much.」
[Shigure]: 「Then, I thought that maybe having more workers would lessen Nii-sama's burden. That was the best plan.」
[Kashou]: 「...... Huh.」
ModelAnswer:
From morning onward, I can't stop my mind from wandering to that unexpected sight.
[Shigure]: "Good morning, Master."
[Shigure]: "I've been thinking about this matter thoroughly this time."
A bright, cloudless smile adorns her face.
The other cats are smiling at me in the same way.
Feeling the cold sweat trickle down,
[Kashou]: "Haa... What do you mean by thinking?..."
I manage to get those words out somehow.
[Shigure]: "This time, I've come to realize just how unreasonable it is to push Master too hard."
[Shigure]: "But as a sister, I've also been so worried that I couldn't sleep at night... that's also true..."
[Shigure]: "So then, increasing the staff and reducing Master's burden would be the best course of action—that's what Shigure has thought."
[Kashou]: "............Haa"

Maple puts the kitchen knife into the cake and quickly slices the cake into pieces.

大袈裟な――と思ったが、俺は時雨の応援に甘えることにした。
チェックインを済ませ、部屋へ。

reference_answer:

[Shigure]: 「Seeing you regain your energy here and working your hardest is the ultimate happiness for me.」
[Kashou]: 「I do appreciate you saying that, but still...」
[Shigure]: 「In fact, it is my purpose in life. My nourishment, my essential nutrients, my water, air, and sunlight.」
While I think she's exaggerating like crazy, I decide to take Shigure up on her support.
We finish checking in and head to our rooms.
[Shigure]: 「Um... How is it, Nii-sama? It doesn't look... odd, I hope?」
[Kashou]: 「It looks great on you, Shigure. You always wear Japanese clothes anyway, so there's not a single thing off about it.」
[Shigure]: 「Hngh... Yes, I suppose. Though, I'm not sure if that is a compliment or a deflection...」
ModelAnswer:

Kashou: "It's nice to hear you say that, but..."
Shigure: "Rather, it's what gives me purpose. My sustenance. Essential nutrients. Like water, air, and sunlight."
Though I thought it was a bit grandiose—I decided to indulge Shigure's support.
After checking in, I headed back to my room.
Shigure: "Um... how do you like it, older brother? Does it look strange?"
Kashou: "It suits you well, Shigure. Since you always wear kimonos, there's no discomfort at all."
Shigure: "Huh... that's right. It feels both joyful and like a stinging rebuke..."

Question:
仕入れ先に頼みたいことがあった。急ぎではないが、早いうちに電話しておいたほうがいい。
個人経営のパティスリーなら普通のことだと思うが、俺は仕入れ先の一つ一つと自分で交渉をしている。
一般流通されていないような食材も、まとまった量を仕入れるなら、売ってくれる農家もある。
味の探究は、食材を探す旅でもあった。
皆が観光で盛り上がっているときに、仕事の話をするのも野暮なので、俺は私用があると言って、部屋を離れる。
念のために旅館からも出て、静かな場所で話すことにした。
電話をかける。
[嘉祥]: 「Bonjour, c'est Kashou Minaduki de La Soleil Japon. Est-ce que je pourrais parler à M. James Carter?」
[嘉祥]: 「ふぅ……」
国外からの注文ということで先方に驚かれたが、どうにか発送してくれそうだ。
俺は旅館の中へと戻る。
reference_answer:
There's something I wanna request from a supplier. It's no rush, but it's a good idea to give him a phone call as soon as possible.
I think it's pretty common for an independently-owned patisserie, but I negotiate with every single supplier on my own.
Even for ingredients not in circulation for the general public, if I need to replenish my supply of them in bulk, there are farmers who will buy it for me.
Researching flavors is also a journey to search for ingredients.
Since it'd be uncouth of me to talk about work when everyone is excited about sightseeing, I tell them that I have personal business to take care of and leave the room.
Just to be sure, I leave the inn and decide to talk someplace quieter.
I make my phone call.
[Kashou]: 「Bonjour, c'est Kashou Minaduki de La Soleil Japon. Est-ce que je pourrais parler à M. James Carter?」
[Kashou]: 「Phew...」
I was met with surprise from the other person on the line since it was an order from overseas, but it seems they'll be putting in my order.
I return to the inn.
ModelAnswer:
I have something I'd like to ask my supplier about. It's not urgent, but it'd be better to call them early on.
For a privately-owned patisserie, I think that's the norm, but I handle negotiations with each and every one of my suppliers myself.
Even if there are ingredients that aren't commonly distributed, if we order in bulk, there are farmers who will sell to us.
Exploring flavors has been like a journey to seek out ingredients.
Since everyone is busy enjoying the sights, it would be inappropriate to talk about work, so I told them I had private matters and left my room.
Just to be safe, I also left the ryokan and decided to have this conversation in a quiet place.
I'll make the call.
[Kashou]: "Bonjour, c'est Kashou Minaduki de La Soleil Japon. Est-ce que je pourrais parler à M. James Carter?"
[Kashou]: "Hmm..."
Since it was an order from overseas, they were surprised at first, but I think they'll manage to ship it somehow.
I return to the ryokan.

[Maple]: "Even cats have things they're bad at, right? Cinnamon, for example, always misses easily."  
[Vanilla]: "Chocola catches it with her hands."  
[Kashou]: "I see…"  
So Chocola and Cinnamon went somewhere else, leaving just these two to compete.  
[Kashou]: "By the way, it's unusual for just Maple and Vanilla to play together."

[Maple]: 「I admit that I was surprised at how capable you were, but you should still be a far cry from my skills.」

[Maple]: 「Huh?」
And the moment that Maple's eyes go astray—
[Vanilla]: 「Wide open!」
With a loud 'tic' of the ball being ricocheted across the table, Vanilla serves an ace over Maple.

[Maple]: "I was surprised Vanilla is actually skilled, but I should still be faster than you."
[Vanilla]: "...Ah, Cinnamon is calling me."
[Maple]: "Huh?"
The moment Maple looked away --
[Vanilla]: "Gap available!"

I leave the ping-pong table and head someplace else.
I find Azuki and Cinnamon in the game corner. I feel like seeing these two together is pretty rare, too.
[Cinnamon]: 「Waah! Haah-ngh! Ah, aah! Yah!!」
Azuki is playing silently while Cinnamon is watching from behind, rocking her body from side to side and letting out bizarre yelps.

Azuki operated quietly while Cinnamon shook her body left and right, making strange noises in the background.

Question:
[ショコラ]: 「はむはむ……おまんじゅう、おーいしー」

[ココナツ]: 「お兄ちゃん！」
[ショコラ]: 「もう用事はいいんですか？」
[嘉祥]: 「ああ、終わったよ」

reference_answer:

[Coconut]: 「I see... This is the best!」
[Kashou]: 「Hey, hey...」
[Chocola]: 「Oh, Master!」

metadata:
[character] Name: Coconut (ココナツ) | Gender: Female

Question:

reference_answer:

[Kashou]: 「Right.」
[Chocola]: 「And they looked delicious!」

It's neither a deep nor compelling reason at all.

[Kashou]: 「I assume that one tiny little hot-spring manju probably wouldn't spoil your appetite for dinner, Coconut.」

Still, this probably isn't worth scolding them over...

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
Question:
[嘉祥]: 「どれ、１つ食べてみるか」
屋台で温泉まんじゅうを１つ買った。
できたて熱々だ。
かじってみると、ふっくらしていて、思っていたよりしっとりした食感だった。
舌のうえで、ほろほろと餡子が崩れて、甘味が広がる。
[嘉祥]: 「なるほど……ほふほふ……これは、美味しいな」
俺が作る洋菓子も、実家の和菓子も、温かいものを出すということはない。
熱々のまんじゅうを、ほふほふ言いながら食べるのは、これはこれで面白い体験だった。
[嘉祥]: 「そういえば、温泉街には何度か来ているけれど……食べたことなかったな」
昔はネコたちがいなかったからだ。
両親と時雨と俺の４人で旅行しても、買い食いしようなんて話にはならなかった。
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Well then, maybe I should have one.」
I buy a hot-spring manju bun from the stand.
It's freshly made and piping hot.
I take a bite into it, and my mouth is greeted by a fluffy and moist sensation.
Atop my tongue, the red bean paste starts to break down, and the sweetness starts to spread.
[Kashou]: 「Now I see... Fff, Fff... This is pretty good.」
Neither the Western sweets I make nor the Japanese sweets my family makes are ever served warm.
Eating a piping-hot manju bun while huffing to cool it down in my mouth is a pretty interesting experience in its own right.
[Kashou]: 「You know, I've been to the hot spring district plenty of times in the past, but... I never ate one of these before.」
Mostly because the catgirls weren't around back then.
Even when the four of us—my parents, Shigure, and I—traveled, buying local snacks and eating never came into the equation.
ModelAnswer:
[Kashou]: "Which one should I try?"
Bought a hot onsen manjū from the street vendor.
It was freshly made and piping hot.
Taking a bite, it was fluffy and had a moister texture than I expected.
As it melted on my tongue, the filling crumbled softly and sweetness spread.
[Kashou]: "Hmm... puff puff... this is delicious."
Neither the Western pastries I make nor the wagashi from home are served warm.
Eating the hot manjū while saying "puff puff" was an interesting experience in itself.
[Kashou]: "Speaking of which, I've been to this onsen town several times... but I never tried it before."
It was because there weren't any cats back then.
Even when my parents, Shigure, and I traveled together as four, we never talked about stuffing ourselves with food.

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[element] Name: Bell (鈴) | Type: Accessory
[element] Name: La Soleil (ラ・ソレイユ) | Type: Place
Question:
[嘉祥]: 「やあ、ここに居たのか、時雨。もしかして用事？」
[時雨]: 「いいえ、もう大丈夫です」
[嘉祥]: 「もしかして、時雨も仕事の電話だったのかな？」
[時雨]: 「……は、はい。すみません。せっかくの旅行中に」
[嘉祥]: 「謝るようなことじゃないよ。ソレイユは定休日だけど、世間は平日なんだし」
詳しくは聞いていないが、時雨は会社を経営しているらしい。
その収入で、ネコたちの衣服を買ったり、鈴持ちの受験をさせたり。
父親は俺に対しては厳しいが、妹の時雨には甘い。ネコのことも商売のことも、自由にさせているようだった。
[嘉祥]: 「ネコたちは、思い思いに満喫してたよ。卓球とか、ゲームとか……売店とか」
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Heya, so this is where you've been, Shigure? Did you need something?」
[Shigure]: 「No, I'm fine now.」
[Kashou]: 「Did you have to put in a call for work, too, by any chance?」
[Shigure]: 「...Y-Yes. I apologize for doing it in the middle of our vacation.」
[Kashou]: 「Nothing to apologize over. La Soleil may be on a regular holiday, but it is a weekday by normal standards.」
She never told me the specifics, but Shigure apparently runs a company.
With her income, she's able to buy the catgirls' clothes and allow them to take bell-holder exams, among other things.
My dad is harsh toward me, but he's soft toward my younger sister, Shigure. It seems that he is pretty liberal toward the catgirls and his business.
[Kashou]: 「The catgirls are enjoying themselves individually. Playing ping-pong, playing video games... buying from the concession stand.」
ModelAnswer:
[Kashou]: "Hey, there you are, Shigure. Could it be that you have business here?"
[Shigure]: "No, I'm fine now."
[Kashou]: "Could it be that Shigure also received a work-related call?"
[Shigure]: "……Yes, that's right. Sorry about this during our难得的旅行 (this rare trip)."
[Kashou]: "You don't need to apologize. La Soleil is closed on Sundays, but the world is just like any other weekday."
I haven't asked in detail, but Shigure seems to run a company.
With that income, she buys clothes for the cats and even has them take entrance exams with Bell.
Her father is strict with me, but he's indulgent toward his sister Shigure. It seems he lets her do whatever she wants with both the cats and business.
[Kashou]: "The cats were enjoying themselves however they wanted—playing table tennis, games... even at the vending machine."

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
[時雨]: 「それはよかったです。……兄様、たまには兄妹水入らずで遊びませんか？」
[嘉祥]: 「いいけど、何する？」
[時雨]: 「カラオケルームがあるそうですよ？」
[嘉祥]: 「カラオケか……高校時代に、ちょっと行ったきりだな。時雨、歌えるのか？」
[時雨]: 「幼少期に合唱をやっていましたから、少しは」
そういうことになった。
[時雨]: 「それでは、兄様への想いを込めて……」
歌いはじめると、雰囲気が一変した。
[時雨]: 「～～～♪」
[嘉祥]: 「……すごい」
[時雨]: 「はぁ～、ひさしぶりに大きな声を出しました」
[嘉祥]: 「めちゃくちゃ上手いじゃないか！」
はっきり言って、プロ並だった。俺は惜しみない拍手を送る。
reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「I am glad to hear that... Nii-sama, how about we both enjoy ourselves—just us, as brother and sister?」
[Kashou]: 「Sure, but what did you have in mind?」
[Shigure]: 「I've heard they have a karaoke room here.」
[Kashou]: 「Karaoke, eh? I only went a bit back in high school. Can you sing, Shigure?」
[Shigure]: 「I dabbled in chorus when I was a child.」
Sounds like a plan, then.
[Shigure]: 「Now then, this will be dedicated to you, Nii-sama...」
Once she starts singing, the mood gets turned on its head.
[Shigure]: 「~~~♪」
[Kashou]: 「...Amazing.」
[Shigure]: 「Hah~ It has been quite some time since I've exerted my voice like that.」
[Kashou]: 「You're REALLY good!」
To be frank, she's practically pro level. I give her generous applause.
ModelAnswer:
[Shigure]: "That was nice. ...Master, how about we have a sibling-only outing once in a while?"
[Kashou]: "Sure, but what are we doing?"
[Shigure]: "I heard there's a karaoke room?"
[Kashou]: "Karaoke... I used to go there back in high school, but that was it. Can Shigure actually sing?"
[Shigure]: "I did chorus when I was young, so a little bit."
So it came to pass like that.
[Shigure]: "Then, let's put all my feelings for you into this..."
As soon as she started singing, the atmosphere changed completely.
[Shigure]: "~♪"
[Kashou]: "......Impressive."
[Shigure]: "Haa... It's been a while since I sang out loud like that."
[Kashou]: "You're really good! Like a pro!"
To be honest, it was on par with professionals. I clapped without holding back.

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
Question:
[時雨]: 「そんなに兄様に褒めていただけるなんて……幸福の極みです」
[時雨]: 「私の歌が、兄様に喜んでいただけるなんて……この声が……兄様の記憶に……はぁ、はぁ……」
[時雨]: 「うっ……鼻血が……」
[嘉祥]: 「お、おい、大丈夫か？」
[時雨]: 「ううぅ……よろしければ、次は兄様が歌ってくださいまし」
[嘉祥]: 「うっ……わ、わかった」
２人でカラオケに来て、歌わないというわけにもいかないか。抜群に上手い時雨のあとでは、つらいものがあるが……
[嘉祥]: 「えーっと……新しめの曲だと、留学してたときに覚えたやつが……」
リストを探してみる。
[嘉祥]: 「あれ？　見つからないな……ほどほどにヒット曲だと思うんだけど……？」
reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「I never expected you to give me such ample praise... I am absolutely thrilled.」
[Shigure]: 「To think that my singing could delight you so much... This voice... is in your memories... Hah, hah...」
[Shigure]: 「Urk... I feel a nosebleed coming on...」
[Kashou]: 「H-Hey, are you all right?」
[Shigure]: 「Unghh... If it is not too much to ask, would you sing a song next?」
[Kashou]: 「Urk... O-Okay, fine.」
The two of us are here to do some karaoke, so I very well can't NOT sing, huh? Though, going up after an excellent singer like Shigure does load on the pressure...
[Kashou]: 「Um, let's see... For newish songs, there's that one I learned back when I was studying abroad...」
I search the list.
[Kashou]: 「Huh? I can't find it... I thought it was more or less a hit song, too...」
ModelAnswer:
[Shigure]: "To be praised so much by my lord... This is the height of happiness."
[Shigure]: "That my song could bring joy to my lord... This voice... In my lord's memories... Haa, haa..."
[Shigure]: "Ugh... Nosebleed..."
[Kashou]: "Eh? Are you okay?"
[Shigure]: "Uu... If it pleases you, then perhaps next time my lord should sing."
[Kashou]: "Ugh... I understand."
It's impossible to come here to karaoke and not sing. After such an outstanding Shigure, there's something painful about it...
[Kashou]: "Hmm... There's a new song I learned while studying abroad..."
He searches through the list.
[Kashou]: "Huh? Can't find it... It was a hit song, so I thought it would be easy to remember...?"

In the end, I sing a song that was popular back in my high school days, faintly remembering the lyrics.

I exit the room, careful not to make a sound on the way out.

Darkness.

売った物と、レジの中の金額が合わないことは、希にある。あまり多くては困るが……

[メイプル]: 「１円」
reference_answer:
[Maple]: 「K-Kashou!」
[Kashou]: 「Huh...?」
I take a breath to regain my composure.
Close call. I almost started shouting in front of everyone.
[Cinnamon]: 「Be still, my heart...」
[Kashou]: 「Maple, Cinnamon? You guys are still here?」
I thought that the shop would be closed by now, but here they are...
[Maple]: 「The register count didn't add up. Azuki said 'not to sweat such a small matter', but...」
[Cinnamon]: 「We couldn't help ourselves~ So the two of us recounted it~」
It's rare that our sold stock doesn't add up with the money in the register. If it's too much of a difference, it could be a problem, but...
[Kashou]: 「How much didn't add up?」
[Maple]: 「One yen.」
ModelAnswer:
[Maple]: "Ka, Kashou..."
[Kashou]: "Hmm..."
I take a deep breath.
This is dangerous. I almost made my voice rough in front of everyone.
[Cinnamon]: "Doki doki..."
[Kashou]: "Maple, Cinnamon. Did you two still have some left?"
I thought the shop had already closed...
[Maple]: "The register wouldn't balance. Azuki told me not to worry about small details."
[Cinnamon]: "It was bothersome~ We were counting again ourselves~"
It rarely happens that the sold items and the cash register total don't match, but if it's too much, it could be a problem...
[Kashou]: "How much didn't balance?"
[Maple]: "One yen."

Question:

[嘉祥]: 「そして、恐くもある……いずれは、自分の心の問題なのに、その自覚すらできず、君たちを遠ざけてしまうんじゃないか、って……」
[嘉祥]: 「俺は君たちに感謝してる。だけど、独りになりたいと思う時間が増えてきてて……」
[嘉祥]: 「それが本当に嫌なのに……」
[嘉祥]: 「すまない。今だって……こんなことを言うべきじゃないって、頭では、わかっているのに……くっ……」
[シナモン]: 「うっ、ぐす……うぇ～～～」
[嘉祥]: 「すまない……」
[シナモン]: 「嘉祥さん、かわいそう～」
reference_answer:
[Cinnamon]: 「Huh...?」
[Kashou]: 「Lately, I feel like the more support I get from you guys, the more pain it causes me.」
[Kashou]: 「I absolutely hate feeling that way, but... I'm aware of the fact that I've been losing my composure.」
[Kashou]: 「And I'm afraid that eventually... even though it's all in my head, I won't be able to keep myself in check and I'll end up pushing you all away from me...」
[Kashou]: 「I'm so grateful to have you all, but I'm having more moments where I feel like I want to be by myself...」
[Kashou]: 「Even though I really hate that idea...」
[Kashou]: 「Sorry. Even now... I know in my mind that I shouldn't be saying that, and yet... Khh...」
[Cinnamon]: 「Ungh, sniffle... Waah~」
[Kashou]: 「I'm sorry...」
[Cinnamon]: 「Poor Kashou-san~」
ModelAnswer:
[Cinnamon]: "Eh…? What?"
[Kashou]: "Lately, I've been suffering so much that people are cheering me on."
[Kashou]: "It's the worst feeling to have that thought... and I'm aware that my mind is becoming less flexible."
[Kashou]: "And there's also this fear... that one day, I won't even realize it's a problem with my own heart, and I'll push you all away without knowing..."
[Kashou]: "I'm grateful to you all. But the times when I want to be alone are increasing..."
[Kashou]: "Even though that really bothers me..."
[Kashou]: "Sorry. Even now... I know I shouldn't say this, but in my head, I understand..."
[Cinnamon]: "Ugh, gusu... weee~"
[Kashou]: "I'm sorry..."
[Cinnamon]: "Master Kashou, you poor thing~"

Question:
[シナモン]: 「だって、苦しいから～……苦しすぎて、だから……言いたくないことも、口から出ちゃうって……」

[シナモン]: 「どっちも……ぐす……わかる……ううぅ……かなしい～……かなしいんですからぁ～……！」
[嘉祥]: 「シナモン……すまない……」
[シナモン]: 「あ、あやまらないで……ください。嘉祥さんは、悪くないんですよぅ～……！」
[シナモン]: 「嘉祥さんはぁ……ぐすっ……泣いていいんです～……っ。だって、悲しいんですから～」
[嘉祥]: 「俺は……」
そうか。これは、悲しいのか。
自分の実力のなさが……努力が報われない、失望が……

reference_answer:
[Cinnamon]: 「I mean, you're in pain~... You're in so much pain, and that's why... you ended up saying what you didn't want to say...」
[Cinnamon]: 「Unghh... Not being able to say what you want to say... and saying what you don't want to say...」
[Cinnamon]: 「Either way... sniffle... I understand... Unghh... It's so sad~... It's so very saaad~...!」
[Kashou]: 「Cinnamon... I'm sorry...」
[Cinnamon]: 「D-Don't apologize... please. You aren't in the wrong here, Kashou-saaan~...!」
[Cinnamon]: 「Kashou-san, youuu... sniffle... you can let it out and cry~...! It is sad, after all~」
[Kashou]: 「I...」
I see. So this is sad?
My lack of skills is sad... The disappointment of my hard work going unrewarded is sad...
[Maple]: 「Khh... It makes me want to cry, too...」
ModelAnswer:
[Cinnamon]: "Because it's painful... too painful, so... things I don't want to say come out of my mouth..."
[Cinnamon]: "Ugh... the feeling that I want to say something but can't... the feeling that I don't want to say something... and the feeling that I have to say it anyway..."
[Cinnamon]: "Both... guh... I understand... uuuu... it's so sad... because it's so sad~!!"
[Kashou]: "Cinnamon... I'm sorry..."
[Cinnamon]: "Ah, please don't apologize... Kashou-san isn't bad at all~!"
[Cinnamon]: "Kashou-san... guh... it's okay to cry... because you're sad, right?"
[Kashou]: "I..."
So. This is sad, isn't it?
My own lack of ability... that my efforts go unrewarded, disappointment...
[Maple]: "Ugh... I feel like crying too..."

That's why it's making my ears recoil. Or rather, my heart ache.

[Kashou]: 「Huh?」
[Maple]: 「Normally, when I cheer you on, you give me a smile and reply, 'Thank you, I'll do my best.'」
[Cinnamon]: 「Aah~ That is true~ Kashou-san normally does that~」
[Kashou]: 「That may be true, but right now...」
[Maple]: 「Well, you just told us that you've been losing your composure.」

ModelAnswer:

[嘉祥]: "...I understand, but still."

[嘉祥]: "That's the truth."
All the more so, it hurts to hear. No, it's my heart that hurts.

[嘉祥]: "Huh?"

[嘉祥]: "That might be... but now..."
[メイプル]: "That's why I told you that you don't have any peace of mind anymore."
[嘉祥]: "I understand, but it's something I can't control myself."

[Shigure]: 「I was trying to perfectly blend in with the local people.」
[Kashou]: 「Uh, well... Even in Paris, you don't really see people running around with such an aristocratic-looking dress.」
Paris is full of stone-paved roads and you're often climbing stairs, so wearing high-heels is risky. Even the majority of ladies wear sneakers or leather shoes.
Also, most girls wear slim jeans, so girls in skirts are rare.
Their clothes are usually black or white. Mostly anyone wearing beige or patterned outerwear is a tourist.

[Kashou]: 「Uh, well... Your outfit looks nice on you, so it's fine, right?」

Paris has many cobbled streets and often uses stairs, so high heels are a risk for falling. Many women wear sneakers or leather shoes, even as females.
And many women wear slim jeans, while wearing skirts is quite rare.
The colors of the clothes are mostly black or white. Those wearing beige or patterned jackets were likely sleepy tourists.

[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
[時雨]: 「それに……留学していた頃は……兄様がずっと戻ってこない可能性も、ありましたから」
[嘉祥]: 「あ、なるほど」
俺が洋菓子の道に進んだことで、父親との仲は冷えこんでいた。
留学が終わっても、パリに留まるという可能性も、充分にあったわけだ。
[嘉祥]: 「俺としては、日本で店を開くことは、決めていたんだが……」
[時雨]: 「何か理由があるのでしょうか？」
[嘉祥]: 「やっぱり……親父から逃げた、なんて思われたくなかった。俺にも意地がある」
[嘉祥]: 「あと、師匠に言われたんだよ。ちゃんと父親と話し合ったほうがいい。日本に戻りなさい、って」
[時雨]: 「師匠様が……」
[嘉祥]: 「今では、師匠の味を、俺の生まれ故郷の街に伝えるのも、けっこう意味のあることだと思ってる」
reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「Also... when you were still studying abroad... there was a chance that you would never come back to Japan.」
[Kashou]: 「Aah, I see now.」
By going down the path of a Western sweets maker, my relationship with my dad soured.
Even when my study abroad was over, there was still a big possibility that I would stay in Paris.
[Kashou]: 「Well, by that time, I made up my mind to open my shop in Japan...」
[Shigure]: 「Was there any reason behind that decision?」
[Kashou]: 「Well... I didn't want people to think that I ran away from Dad. I have my pride.」
[Kashou]: 「Also, my mentor told me to. She said that I should talk it out with my dad and return to Japan.」
[Shigure]: 「Your mentor...」
[Kashou]: 「Nowadays, I think that was really important in bringing my mentor's distinct flavor over to the town I was born and raised in.」
ModelAnswer:
[Shigure]: "And besides... during the time I was studying abroad... there was always a chance that you wouldn't come back, Master."
[Kashou]: "Ah, I see."
Because I chose to pursue a career in pastry, my relationship with my father had grown cold.
Even after finishing my studies abroad, it was entirely possible he would remain in Paris.
[Kashou]: "As for me, I'd already decided to open a shop in Japan..."
[Shigure]: "Is there some reason?"
[Kashou]: "Well... I didn't want anyone thinking I had run away from my father. I have pride too."
[Kashou]: "Also, the master told me. He said it would be better if I talked to my father properly and returned to Japan."
[Shigure]: "The master..."
[Kashou]: "Nowadays, I think passing on the master's style to the streets of my hometown in Japan is quite meaningful."

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
[element] Name: La Soleil (ラ・ソレイユ) | Type: Place
Question:
[時雨]: 「はい！」
[嘉祥]: 「さて、そろそろ行こうか。クレープは入りそうかい？」
[時雨]: 「もちろんです、兄様！　はむ！」
[嘉祥]: 「気をつけろよ、時雨。パリは危険な街だからな」
[時雨]: 「え？　は、はい……」
[嘉祥]: 「油断してると、あっという間に体重が増えるぞ。美味しい物がいっぱいあるからな！」
[時雨]: 「ひぇ……」
[嘉祥]: 「ごくり……」
お昼近く――営業時間を待って、俺は店の前まで来た。
約束は取り付けてあるとはいえ……やっぱり、緊張する。
[時雨]: 「まぁ、素敵です！　ここが、本家ラ・ソレイユなのですね、兄様？」
reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「Indeed!」
[Kashou]: 「Now then, it's about time we get going. Got room for crepes?」
[Shigure]: 「Of course, Nii-sama! Nom!」
[Kashou]: 「Be careful, Shigure. Paris is a dangerous city.」
[Shigure]: 「Huh? Y-Yes, I will...」
[Kashou]: 「If you don't keep up your guard, you'll end up gaining weight before you know it. There's a whole lot of tasty things to be had here!」
[Shigure]: 「Eep...」
[Kashou]: 「Gulp...」
Nearly lunchtime— After waiting for normal business hours, I find myself in front of the shop.
I know that I've made plans, but... I'm still getting nervous.
[Shigure]: 「My, it's splendid! So this is the original La Soleil, isn't it, Nii-sama?!」
ModelAnswer:
[Shigure]: "Yes!"
[Kashou]: "Well, let's go soon. Does it seem like the crepes are ready?"
[Shigure]: "Of course, Onii-sama! Here we go!"
[Kashou]: "Be careful, Shigure. Paris is a dangerous city after all."
[Shigure]: "Eh? H-huh...?"
[Kashou]: "If you let your guard down, you'll gain weight in no time. There are so many delicious things here!"
[Shigure]: "Hie..."
[Kashou]: "Gurgle..."
Around noon—waiting for business hours to end—I arrived at the shop.
Even though we had made an appointment... I still felt nervous.
[Shigure]: "Well, this is wonderful! This must be the original La Soleil, isn't it, Onii-sama?"

[時雨]: 「兄様の留学先、この近くなのですね」
[嘉祥]: 「ああ、この通りを数分歩いた先だな」

[嘉祥]: 「うーん……学生のお客さんもいるけど……」
[嘉祥]: 「やっぱり、主婦が一番多いかな。子連れのお母さんも、よく来るよ」
reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「You've told me about this place so many times in the past, but... I can't believe I'm finally getting to visit.」
[Shigure]: 「This is sacred ground to me. This whole thing feels like a pilgrimage.」
[Kashou]: 「...Does it?」
[Kashou]: 「Where I studied abroad is close to here, so it's got a lot of nostalgia for me. Kind of like I'm back for the first time in a while.」
[Shigure]: 「Ah, your old school is nearby, Nii-sama?」
[Kashou]: 「Yeah, a few minutes down this street, in fact.」
[Shigure]: 「In that case, are a lot of the customers here at the original La Soleil students?」
[Kashou]: 「Hmm... They have their fair share of students, but...」
[Kashou]: 「I'd say housewives are the biggest group of customers. A lot of mothers come with their kids, too.」
ModelAnswer:
[Shigure]: "I've heard from you several times about this... and finally, I've been able to visit."
[Shigure]: "To me, it's a sacred place. It truly feels like a pilgrimage."
[Kashou]: "...Is that so?"
[Kashou]: "Since my study abroad is nearby, it feels nostalgic. Like coming home."
[Shigure]: "Your study abroad location is near here, then?"
[Kashou]: "Yeah, just a few minutes' walk from here."
[Shigure]: "So, the customers at the original La Soleil are mostly students, right?"
[Kashou]: "Well... there are some student customers..."
[Kashou]: "Actually, I think housewives make up the largest group. Mothers with children also come often."

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
Question:
[嘉祥]: 「フランスでは、食事のときにケーキを食べるのは、ごく普通のことだ」
[嘉祥]: 「一般家庭でも、夕飯は――サラダ、スープ、パン、魚料理、肉料理、チーズ、デザート……みたいに出すからな」
どのくらい皿数を出すかは、各家庭によるが。
[時雨]: 「毎日がフランス料理ですね」
[嘉祥]: 「だから、ほとんど毎日のようにケーキを食べる人も、そう珍しくないんだよ」
[時雨]: 「ふむふむ……なるほど……」
[時雨]: 「なんだか、不思議な感じがします。ご家庭でコース料理だなんて」
[嘉祥]: 「いやいや……日本の一般的な家庭料理だって、別の国の人からしたら、まるで懐石料理だよ」
[嘉祥]: 「お茶、お米、味噌汁、惣菜、肉魚……使っている皿の数には、大差ないだろ？」
[時雨]: 「言われてみれば……！」
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「But here in France, it's extremely common to eat cake at dinner time.」
[Kashou]: 「Even when it comes to normal families, dinner usually goes: Salad, soup, bread, seafood, meat, cheese, desert.」
How many dishes they produce depends on the family, though.
[Shigure]: 「Every day is French cuisine, then.」
[Kashou]: 「So, yeah, it's not that rare to see most people eating a cake almost every day.」
[Shigure]: 「Mm-hmm, mm-hmm... I see.」
[Shigure]: 「I still find it rather curious that households partake in full course meals.」
[Kashou]: 「Well, I mean... even for general home cooking in Japan, from other countries' perspective, it looks like a Japanese version of a full course meal.」
[Kashou]: 「Tea, white rice, miso soup, entrees, meat, and fish... There's not much difference between the amount of dishes they use.」
[Shigure]: 「Oh, when you put it that way...!」
ModelAnswer:
[Kashou]: "In France, it's quite common to eat cake during meals."
[Kashou]: "Even in ordinary households, dinner is served with -- salad, soup, bread, fish dishes, meat dishes, cheese, dessert... and so on."
The number of plates used varies by household.
[Shigure]: "Every day is French cuisine, huh?"
[Kashou]: "That's why it's not unusual for people to eat cake almost every day."
[Shigure]: "Hmm... I see..."
[Shigure]: "It feels a bit mysterious. Having course meals at home, you know?"
[Kashou]: "No, no... Even common Japanese household dishes would seem like kaiseki to someone from another country."
[Kashou]: "The number of plates used for tea, rice, miso soup, side dishes, meat and fish -- there's not much difference, right?"
[Shigure]: "Now that you mention it...!"

Question:
[時雨]: 「あっ、私、水無月時雨と申します」
[時雨]: 「や、約束もないのに、ついてきてしまって……もちろん、ご迷惑はおかけしませんので！」
[ベニエ]: 「時雨……？　じゃあ、嘉祥の妹の……？」
[時雨]: 「は、はい」
[嘉祥]: 「申し訳ありません、師匠……勝手についてきてしまって」
[ベニエ]: 「よく来たわね、時雨……！　ずっと会いたいと思っていたわ」
[時雨]: 「あ……私もです、ベニエさん。兄様ったら、帰国したあと師匠様の話ばかりするものだから」
[ベニエ]: 「あら、そうなの？　嘉祥は、フランスでは妹の話ばかりしていたわ」
[嘉祥]: 「えっ、そ、そんなことはないでしょう……？」
reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「Oh, I am Shigure Minaduki.」
[Shigure]: 「I-I'm here unannounced since I tagged along... but, of course, I will make sure that I am of no inconvenience!」
[Beignet]: 「Shigure...? Then, you're Kashou's little sister...?」
[Shigure]: 「Y-Yes, ma'am.」
[Kashou]: 「My apologies, Mentor... She followed me of her own accord.」
[Beignet]: 「I'm so glad you've come, Shigure...! I've always wanted to meet you!」
[Shigure]: 「Oh... As have I, Beignet-san. Nii-sama couldn't stop talking about his prized mentor after coming back from overseas, after all.」
[Beignet]: 「Oh my, is that so? Kashou couldn't stop talking about his lovely little sister while in France.」
[Kashou]: 「Huh? Th-That isn't true, though...?」
ModelAnswer:
[Shigure]: "Ah, my name is Minaduki Shigure."
[Shigure]: "Y-yeah, even though we didn't make any arrangements, you followed me anyway... of course, I won't cause you any trouble!"
[Beignet]: "Shigure...? So then, are you Kashou-sama's younger sister...?"
[Shigure]: "Y-yes."
[Kashou]: "I'm sorry, Mentor... I just followed you without permission."
[Beignet]: "You came all the way here, Shigure...! I've been wanting to see you for a long time."
[Shigure]: "Ah... me too, Beignet-san. My older brother only talks about you after returning from abroad."
[Beignet]: "Oh, is that so? Kashou was only talking about his sister in France."
[Kashou]: "E-eh, no, that can't be right...?"

何年も働いていた店だ。物の位置も、段取りも、ほとんど変わっていない。全て覚えている。
俺は戸惑うことなく、開店準備に取りかかった。
ショーケースの中を拭き、ケーキを並べる。
reference_answer:

I worked in this shop for years. The location of items, the preparations—almost nothing has changed. I remember everything.
I get started on preparing for opening without any indecision.
I wipe off the glass showcase and line up the cakes.

This shop has been in operation for years. The placement of items and the arrangement haven't changed at all. I remember everything perfectly.
Without hesitation, I got to work preparing for the store opening.
I wiped down the display case and arranged the cakes.

[Kashou]: 「Yes...」

Something dad and Mentor both understand.
However, it's not something that can be explained in words.
[Kashou]: 「Unghh...」

[Kashou]: "Yeah, probably..."

[Kashou]: "Yes..."

[Kashou]: 「No, she is just pushy.」

[Beignet]: 「A single motivated person can cross a river, but a person who motivates many can build a bridge.」
[Kashou]: 「Yeah, maybe Shigure is the type to help build bridges.」

[Kashou]: 「Huh?! Me, too...?!」

[Kashou]: 「You didn't feed her a lie, did you?」

[Beignet]: "A person with their own willpower can cross a river, but one who inspires others to have willpower can build bridges over it."
[Kashou]: "Indeed, Shigure seems like the type to build bridges."

[Kashou]: "Could it really be that he didn't tell you a lie?!"

[Kashou]: 「Honestly, when I was helping with the shop today, I did kind of ask myself, 'Should I really be doing this right now?'」
[Kashou]: 「I thought, 'I should be baking the cake that'll satisfy my dad before Christmas'.」
[Kashou]: 「But, as I worked through the day, I kind of started to remember the old days.」
[Kashou]: 「My desire from when I first started off to make Western sweets had resuscitated.」
ModelAnswer:
That cake was a new creation, and it was a flavor I'd never tasted before—but without a doubt, it was the taste of my mentor...
It was fresh yet nostalgic.
[Kashou]: "…I feel like I came to this town just to eat this."
[Beignet]: "Are you feeling a bit more at ease now?"
[Kashou]: "I'm not sure… Was I that bad?"
[Beignet]: "You had that look of a lost kitten."
[Kashou]: "I'm embarrassed to say so."
[Kashou]: "Honestly, when I was helping at the shop, didn't I think, 'Is this really the kind of thing I should be doing?'"
[Kashou]: "I had to make a cake that would convince my father by Christmas—but—"
[Kashou]: "But as I worked, I remembered what it was like back then."
[Kashou]: "The original feeling I had when I wanted to make western pastries—it's come back to me."

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Beignet (ベニエ) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Mentor (師匠)
Question:
[ベニエ]: 「……私は、嘉祥のお父さんではないから、わからないわね。そうかもしれないし、違うのかもしれない」
[ベニエ]: 「言葉というのは、言った本人にすら、本当の意味がわからないこともある」
[ベニエ]: 「１００人が受け取れば、１００通りの解釈があるのが、言葉というものだから」
[ベニエ]: 「大切なのは言葉ではなくて……」
[ベニエ]: 「いえ……少し話しすぎたわね」
[ベニエ]: 「長旅のうえに、ずっと働いて疲れたでしょう。シャワーを浴びて、早めに寝るといいわ」
[ベニエ]: 「あ……うっかりしていたわ。空き部屋はあるけれど、ベッドは嘉祥が使っていたものしか空いてないの」
[ベニエ]: 「一緒に使ってもらってもいいかしら？」
reference_answer:
[Beignet]: 「...I'm not your father, so I don't know. Your hunch could be right, or you it could be wrong.」
[Beignet]: 「There's also a chance that not even he himself knows the true meaning behind what he said.」
[Beignet]: 「Words are like that. You give them to a hundred different people, and they'll interpret them a hundred different ways.」
[Beignet]: 「What's important isn't the words. It's...」
[Beignet]: 「No... I've said too much.」
[Beignet]: 「The day's work on top of the long trip must have you tired, no? You should shower up and hurry to bed.」
[Beignet]: 「Oh... How silly of me to forget. There are empty rooms here, but the only one with a free bed is the one that Kashou used before.」
[Beignet]: 「Would the two of you mind sharing?」
ModelAnswer:
[Beignet]: "……I'm not Kashou-san's father, so I don't know. It could be true, or it might not be."
[Beignet]: "Words can have meanings that even the person who said them may not fully understand."
[Beignet]: "A hundred people receive a message and interpret it a hundred different ways—that's what words are like."
[Beignet]: "What matters isn't the words themselves…"
[Beignet]: "No, perhaps I spoke too much."
[Beignet]: "After such a long journey and all that work, you must be exhausted. Take a shower and get some rest early."
[Beignet]: "Ah… I forgot. There's an empty room, but the only beds available are those Kashou-san used."
[Beignet]: "May I ask if it would be okay for us to share one?"

Question:
[ベニエ]: 「ダメよ。陽が落ちてから出歩くなんて、危ないもの」

[時雨]: 「…………えっ！？」
[嘉祥]: 「時雨が嫌なら、話は別だが」
[時雨]: 「は、はわ……はわわ……兄様と……！？」
[時雨]: 「うっ……私、幸せすぎて……気絶しそうです」
[ベニエ]: 「……本当に大丈夫なのよね、嘉祥？」
[嘉祥]: 「時雨はときどきこうなりますが、絶対に大丈夫です。俺を信用してください、師匠」
[ベニエ]: 「うふふ……なら、安心ね」
[ベニエ]: 「そうなの……時雨はこういう子なのね。会えてよかったわ」
reference_answer:
[Beignet]: 「That will not do. Walking around after sundown could be dangerous.」
[Kashou]: 「That's right. It's a big bed, so we'll manage.」
[Shigure]: 「...Huh?!」
[Kashou]: 「But if you don't want to, that's a different story.」
[Shigure]: 「H-Hah-wah.... Hah-wah-wah... With Nii-sama...?!」
[Shigure]: 「Urk... I am in such bliss... I think I might pass out.」
[Beignet]: 「...You're sure you'll be all right, Kashou?」
[Kashou]: 「Shigure just gets like this sometimes. I'm positive we'll be just fine. Please, believe me, Mentor.」
[Beignet]: 「Tee hee hee... One less worry, then.」
[Beignet]: 「I see... So, this is the type of girl Shigure is. I'm glad I've gotten to meet her.」
ModelAnswer:
[Beignet]: "No way. Going out after the sun sets is dangerous."
[Kashou]: "That's true. With such a large bed, it should be fine."
[Shigure]: "…………Eh!? What!?"
[Kashou]: "If Shigure dislikes it, then we can discuss this separately."
[Shigure]: "Wa, wa…waa…with my elder brother and…!?"
[Shigure]: "Ugh…I'm so happy I might faint!"
[Beignet]: "……Are you really okay, Kashou?"
[Kashou]: "Shigure sometimes acts like this, but she's definitely fine. Please trust me, Mentor."
[Beignet]: "Ufufu…well then, rest assured."
[Beignet]: "So it is…Shigure is such a childlike person. I'm glad we met."

Question:
[時雨]: 「きっと頻繁に手を入れているのでしょうね。部屋は使わなければ、悪くなるものですから」
[嘉祥]: 「言われてみれば……」
[時雨]: 「毎日のように窓を開けたり、埃を払わないと、すぐカビ臭くなります」
[嘉祥]: 「そういうものか？」
[時雨]: 「実家にある兄様の部屋は、私が毎日のように手入れしていますから万全です」
[時雨]: 「窓を開けて、空気を入れ換えて、机を乾拭きし、ベッドの寝心地を確かめています」
[嘉祥]: 「そ、そうか」
ベッドの寝心地は、毎日チェックする必要が……？
[時雨]: 「たぶんベニエさんは、また兄様が来るのをずっと待っていたのだと思います」
[嘉祥]: 「そうか……」
reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「I am to assume that she frequently tidies it up. Rooms are meant to be used, after all.」
[Kashou]: 「Now that you mention it...」
[Shigure]: 「Unless you open the windows and dust almost daily, the smell of mildew will instantly grow.」
[Kashou]: 「Is that how it works?」
[Shigure]: 「I tidy up your room back at home almost every day, so it is spotless.」
[Shigure]: 「I open the windows, air out the inside, wipe down your desk, and check the comfort levels of your bed.」
[Kashou]: 「O-Oh, I see.」
Is there a need for a daily check of my bed's comfort levels...?
[Shigure]: 「It might be that Beignet-san had been waiting for your return this entire time, Nii-sama.」
[Kashou]: 「Huh. Maybe...」
ModelAnswer:
[Shigure]: "I'm sure you're frequently making adjustments, right? If the room isn't used, it will quickly deteriorate."
[Kashou]: "If you say so..."
[Shigure]: "If you don't open the windows every day and dust, it will soon smell musty."
[Kashou]: "Is that how it is?"
[Shigure]: "The room of my older brother at home, which I take care of every day, is in perfect condition."
[Shigure]: "I open the windows to air out the room, wipe down the desk, and check the comfort of the bed."
[Kashou]: "W-well then..."
Checking the comfort of the bed every day...?
[Shigure]: "Perhaps Beignet-san has been waiting for my older brother's arrival every single day."
[Kashou]: "Is that so..."

Question:
[嘉祥]: 「明日も早い。シャワーを浴びて、もう寝るとしよう」

[時雨]: 「はーい」
[時雨]: 「にゃ～お♪　にゃお？　にゃおぅん」
[嘉祥]: 「時雨が病気だ、すぐ病院へ」

[嘉祥]: 「まぁ、今日は、お疲れさまだったな」

[嘉祥]: 「いいさ……俺だって勝手に来たんだ」
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Tomorrow's another early day. Let's shower up and get to bed.」
[Shigure]: 「Huh? We're showering together?! W-Well... m-my body and mind... are ready.」
[Kashou]: 「Of course not together. Hurry and take yours first.」
[Shigure]: 「Right away!」
[Shigure]: 「Nya~oh♪ Nyaoh? Nya-ohm.」
[Kashou]: 「Shigure, you're sick. You need a hospital ASAP.」
[Shigure]: 「My apologies. I am just so thrilled that I forgot human speech for a second.」
[Kashou]: 「Well, you did work hard today.」
[Shigure]: 「You are too kind. Especially considering I tagged along of my own accord.」
[Kashou]: 「Don't sweat it. I came here of my own accord too, so we're in the same boat.」
ModelAnswer:
[Kashou]: "Tomorrow's early too. Let's take a shower and go to bed."
[Shigure]: "Eh, are we taking a shower together!? U, um... I'm mentally prepared for that..."
[Kashou]: "There's no way you are. Hurry up and get in the shower."
[Shigure]: "Yes ma'am."
[Shigure]: "Nyah~o♪ Nyao? Nyaoon~"
[Kashou]: "Shigure, you look sick—let's go to the hospital right away."
[Shigure]: "I'm sorry. I got so happy I accidentally forgot human words."
[Kashou]: "Well then, it was a hard day for you today."
[Shigure]: "That's too kind of you. For me to tag along like this..."
[Kashou]: "It's fine... I came here on my own accord too."

Shigure rises up, fixes her disheveled pajamas, and staggers her way to the shower room.

[Kashou]: "What's wrong, Shigure!? Did you catch a cold!?"
[Shigure]: "Da, daijoubu desu… it was just that… my lord is too amazing…"
[Kashou]: "I don't think I did anything… and you didn't either, right?"

[Kashou]: "Well then, let's take a shower first? You're sweating buckets. The sheets are soaked."
[Shigure]: "It was good that it ended with sweat… I almost turned the guest bed into splatter movie props."
[Kashou]: "Nosebleed...?"
Shigure sat up and straightened her disheveled nightgown, then shuffled toward the shower room.

Question:
[嘉祥]: 「俺のほうが長く働いてたはずなのに、フレーズのほうが手際がいいくらいだもんな」
[フレーズ]: 「嘉祥さんは細かいところまで丁寧です。見習いたいです」
[嘉祥]: 「そうかな？」
[フレーズ]: 「ときどき、ぼーっとしてますけど……」
[嘉祥]: 「うっ……」
[フレーズ]: 「今の嘉祥さんは悩んでいて、考えなくちゃいけないことが、いっぱいあるんでしょうね……」
[フレーズ]: 「パティシエールから、少しだけ事情を聞きました」
[嘉祥]: 「仕事中に、ぼんやりしていい理由にはならないけど」
[フレーズ]: 「そのぶんは、わたしが働きます」
[嘉祥]: 「なんと言ったらいいか……」
申し訳ないような、情けないような。もちろん、感謝の気持ちが一番大きいが。
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「I've been in this line of work for much longer, but you're way more diligent than I'll ever be.」
[Fraise]: 「You put painstaking detail into your work. I'd like to learn by your example.」
[Kashou]: 「Really?」
[Fraise]: 「Granted, I oftentimes see you space out...」
[Kashou]: 「Urk...」
[Fraise]: 「You have a lot of things on your mind that you need to sort out at the moment, right, Kashou-san?」
[Fraise]: 「Pâtissière told me some of the details.」
[Kashou]: 「Yeah, but that's still no reason to space out in the middle of work.」
[Fraise]: 「I will work to pick up the slack.」
[Kashou]: 「I'm not sure what I should say...」
I feel somewhere between apologetic and pathetic. Of course, I'm more grateful than anything, but that goes without saying.
ModelAnswer:
[Kashou]: "I should've worked longer than you, but Fraise is so efficient it's almost like that."
[Fraise]: "Master Kashou is meticulous down to the smallest detail. I want to learn from him."
[Kashou]: "Is that so?"
[Fraise]: "Sometimes he just zones out…"
[Kashou]: "Ugh..."
[Fraise]: "Master Kashou must be worried right now, with all those things he needs to think about..."
[Fraise]: "I heard a little from the pastry chef."
[Kashou]: "It's not a good reason to daydream during work hours."
[Fraise]: "That's why I'll do the work instead."
[Kashou]: "What should I say…"
Something apologetic, pitiful. Of course, my gratitude is the greatest feeling.

Question:

[嘉祥]: 「フレーズはすごく小さい仔ネコだったし、ほんの短い間だったから、覚えてないと思うけど」

reference_answer:

[Kashou]: 「Oh, no. Just a little trip down memory lane.」
[Kashou]: 「Actually, I lived together with you, Fraise, albeit for just a short while.」
[Kashou]: 「You were a super small kitten back then, and it was a really short time, so I don't think you remember.」
[Kashou]: 「You've been smart ever since you were a kid.」
[Fraise]: 「U-Um...」
[Kashou]: 「Hm?」
[Fraise]: 「Actually... I do remember... I remember that you used to live here.」
[Kashou]: 「Huh? Wait, you do?!」
[Fraise]: 「I'm sorry. I realized right when we met, but...」
[Kashou]: 「Dang, you should have told me.」
[Fraise]: 「Well, you seemed to have more pressing matters to attend to...」
[Fraise]: 「I just remember; that's all.」

[Minaduki Kashou]: "No, it's just that I remembered something from the past."

[Fraise]: "I just remember that much."

reference_answer:
[Fraise]: 「I've always looked up to you... and helped out in the shop because of that.」
[Beignet]: 「Then, once she became the catgirl here, she would always say she wanted to help out around shop and even made her name Fraise.」
[Kashou]: 「If memory serves, a catgirl picks their name when they're three months old, so that's when she came here, huh?」
[Fraise]: 「I know you're really busy right now, so... I decided that I wouldn't say anything about me.」
[Fraise]: 「But now that I've eaten the macaron I've dreamed about... I just couldn't control myself any longer...」
[Shigure]: 「It's fine, Fraise. You needn't contain yourself so badly. Nii-sama understands.」
[Kashou]: 「Yeah, of course. Thank you so much for remembering, Fraise.」
[Kashou]: 「Also, I appreciate you helping out Mentor in such big ways as well.」
ModelAnswer:
[Fraise]: "I admired my older brother... and helped out at the shop."
[Beignet]: "And then you said you wanted to stay here as this shop's cat forever, even naming yourself Fraise."
[Kashou]: "It's true that cats get their names when they're about three months old, but is that where it came from..."
[Fraise]: "Now my brother's in a tough spot... I was thinking of not saying anything about me at all."
[Fraise]: "But all this time, dreaming of eating macarons... I couldn't hold out anymore..."
[Shigure]: "That's fine, Fraise. You don't have to hold back that much—your brother understands you."
[Kashou]: "Ah, of course. Thanks for remembering, Fraise."
[Kashou]: "And also my mentor. He helped out a lot, so I'm grateful."

[時雨]: 「あなたのことも、とっても話題になっています。ほら！　ここにも、ほら！」
時雨が突き出したスマホには、フレーズを賞讃する言葉が並んでいた。
会いに行く、と宣言しているお客さんが何人もいる。おそらく、店の前にできた行列の中に……
reference_answer:
[Fraise]: 「Big trouble, Onii-san! There is a line outside...!」
[Kashou]: 「Ooh, we've got even more customers than we did yesterday. It's looking a lot like Christmas over here.」

Shigure holds out her cellphone to reveal a line of comments praising Fraise.
There are even some customers stating they're explicitly coming to see her. Most likely standing in that line outside the shop...

Question:
[時雨]: 「間違いありません。話題になったことで大勢が情報を調べ、名店という評価が多かったからこそ。相乗効果です」
[嘉祥]: 「俺としては、師匠の素晴らしいケーキをより多くの人が知ってくれたから、嬉しいけど」
[フレーズ]: 「ううぅ……明日もこの調子だと、ちょっと大変かもしれません」
[ベニエ]: 「今日が特別だったのよ、きっと」
[ベニエ]: 「今日みたいな行列は、明日はないと思うわ」
[フレーズ]: 「そうですよね……明日は、またパティシエールとわたしだけになりますから」
俺たちは、今夜には発つ予定だった。フランスと日本の時差は７時間。約束の３日間で帰宅するには、そのくらいの時間に出なくては。
結局、俺は自分に足りないものが、まだわからないでいた。
気持ち的には、だいぶ楽になったのだが……
reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「That is absolutely right. The shop becoming a hot topic led to a majority of people looking into information, which led to a lot of rave reviews. It's synergy.」
[Kashou]: 「Personally, I'm glad that a lot of people know about your incredible cakes, Mentor.」
[Fraise]: 「Unghhh... If tomorrow is like it was today, then we might have more than a little problem.」
[Beignet]: 「I'm sure that today was just a special case.」
[Beignet]: 「I don't think we'll have lines out the door again tomorrow.」
[Fraise]: 「Right... Tomorrow will just be Pâtissière and me.」
We both have plans to depart tonight. There's a seven hour time difference between France and Japan, so we need to leave by then in order to make it back home when I promised.
In the end, I still don't know what it is I'm missing.
I feel a lot better mentally, though...
ModelAnswer:
[Shigure]: "There's no mistake. It's because the topic became popular and many people researched it, leading to a high evaluation as a famous shop—that's the synergy effect."
[Kashou]: "As for me, I'm happy that more people learned about my mentor's wonderful cakes."
[Fraise]: "Ugh… If we keep this up tomorrow too, it might get a bit tough."
[Benieto]: "Today was special, after all."
[Benieto]: "I don't think there will be a line like today tomorrow."
[Fraise]: "That's right… Tomorrow, it'll just be me and the pastry chef again."
We were supposed to leave tonight. There's a 7-hour time difference between France and Japan. To return home within the agreed-upon three days, we need to leave around that time.
In the end, I still don't know what it is about myself that's lacking.
Emotionally, I feel much better now…

Question:
[嘉祥]: 「あ、すみません……」
[ベニエ]: 「結局、お役に立てなかったわね」

[嘉祥]: 「あ……まぁ……まだ、父親の言う芯ってのは、よくわかっていません」

[嘉祥]: 「俺は、やっぱり、皆を笑顔にするケーキが作りたい」
[嘉祥]: 「師匠の作るケーキは、本当に美味しくて、優しい味で……皆を笑顔にしてくれるんです」
[ベニエ]: 「……ありがとう。そう言ってもらえて、嬉しいわ」
[嘉祥]: 「俺は、なんだか、いろいろと考えすぎて……最初の気持ちを忘れていたというか……」
[嘉祥]: 「口では目指していると言いつつ、別のことに捕らわれていたように思います」
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Oh, my apologies...」
[Beignet]: 「Looks like I wasn't able to help after all.」
[Kashou]: 「No, that's not true!」
[Kashou]: 「Eh. Well... I'm just still lost on what my father meant by a 'core'.」
[Kashou]: 「But after coming here and helping in the shop, I remembered something.」
[Kashou]: 「I really do want to make cakes that bring smiles to everyone's faces.」
[Kashou]: 「Mentor, your cakes are so good and have such a gentle flavor... that they bring smiles to people's faces.」
[Beignet]: 「...Thank you. It warms my heart to hear you say that.」
[Kashou]: 「It's sort of like I've been thinking of so much... I've lost sight of my initial focus...」
[Kashou]: 「I may have said that was my goal, but I was trapped by something else.」
ModelAnswer:
[Kashou]: "Ah, I'm sorry..."
[Beignet]: "Well, it seems we couldn't help after all"
[Kashou]: "No, that's not true!"
[Kashou]: "Ah... well... I still don't fully understand what my father meant by the 'core'"
[Kashou]: "But coming to this place and helping at the shop brought back memories"
[Kashou]: "I really want to make cakes that bring smiles to everyone's faces"
[Kashou]: "Master's cakes are truly delicious, with a gentle flavor... they always put smiles on people's faces"
[Beignet]: "...Thank you. It makes me happy to hear you say that"
[Kashou]: "I think I was overthinking things... maybe I forgot my original intentions..."
[Kashou]: "While saying I aimed for this, it felt like I was trapped by something else"

[character] Name: Beignet (ベニエ) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Mentor (師匠)
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
[ベニエ]: 「前にも言ったとおり、嘉祥のお父さんの真意はわからないけれど、私は貴方のことを応援しているわ」
[嘉祥]: 「ありがとうございます」
[嘉祥]: 「そういえば、俺がケーキを作る理由は、何度も話しているけれど……師匠のことは聞いたことがないですよね」
[ベニエ]: 「……そうね」
[嘉祥]: 「いや、前に聞いたときは、ケーキを作る理由は、私がパティシエールだからって答えられたんですけど……」
[ベニエ]: 「ふふ……そうだったかしら？」
[嘉祥]: 「それなら、パティシエールになった理由は、どうなんでしょうか？」
[ベニエ]: 「……この店は……私の祖母の代からのもので、ずっとケーキを作ってきたの」
[ベニエ]: 「嘉祥の家ほどではないけれど、守るべき伝統があると思っているわ」
reference_answer:
[Beignet]: 「Just as I've said before, I don't know what your father meant, but I support you, regardless.」
[Kashou]: 「Thank you very much.」
[Kashou]: 「Speaking of which, I've talked about my reasons for cake-making plenty of times, but... you've never talked about yours, have you, Mentor?」
[Beignet]: 「...That's right.」
[Kashou]: 「Well, when I asked you in the past, I remember you answered, 'I make cakes because I'm a pâtissière', but...」
[Beignet]: 「Hehe... Did I now?」
[Kashou]: 「In that case, what about your reasons for being a pâtissière in the first place?」
[Beignet]: 「...This pâtissièrie... has been making cakes since my grandmother's generation.」
[Beignet]: 「And while not to the extent of your family, I do think that it has a tradition that needs to be protected.」
ModelAnswer:
[Beignet]: "Like I said before, I don't understand your father's true intentions, but I'm rooting for you."
[Kashou]: "Thank you very much."
[Kashou]: "Speaking of which, I've talked about why I make cakes many times... But I've never heard anything about my mentor."
[Beignet]: "...That's right."
[Kashou]: "No, when I last heard, the reason for making cakes was that it's because I'm a pastry chef... Right?"
[Beignet]: "Fufu... Is that so?"
[Kashou]: "Then, what about the reason you became a pastry chef?"
[Beignet]: "...This shop has been around since my grandmother's time, and we've always made cakes."
[Beignet]: "It may not be as grand as your family's, but I think there are traditions worth preserving."

Question:
[嘉祥]: 「ん？　あれ、俺……実家が和菓子屋だとは言ったけど、そんな歴史あるって話はしましたっけ？」
洋菓子を教えてもらうために弟子入りするのに、実家の和菓子屋が老舗だという話は、場違いな気がして避けていたのだが……
[ベニエ]: 「それは……」
[時雨]: 「すみません、兄様！　私が、今朝」
[嘉祥]: 「え？」
[時雨]: 「兄様の状況を知っておいていただく必要がある、と考えまして。差し出がましい真似を……」
[嘉祥]: 「いや、いいんだ。隠してたわけじゃないから」
[ベニエ]: 「ええ……時雨から事情を聞いたのよ」
[嘉祥]: 「そうだったんですね。あっ、余計な話をして、すみません。このラ・ソレイユに伝統があるという話でしたよね」
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Hm? Huh? I... did say that my family owned a Japanese pastry shop, but did I ever mention that they had a history?」
I became her apprentice to learn Western pastry making, so I avoided mentioning my parents owning a long-standing Japanese pastry shop to make things simpler...
[Beignet]: 「Well...」
[Shigure]: 「My apologies, Nii-sama! I told her this morning!」
[Kashou]: 「Huh?」
[Shigure]: 「I thought she needed to know about your situation, so I did something rather intrusive...」
[Kashou]: 「No, it's all good. I wasn't trying to keep it a secret.」
[Beignet]: 「Yes... Shigure told me about your situation.」
[Kashou]: 「So, that's how you know. Oh, I'm sorry for cutting you off. You were saying something about the tradition of La Soleil?」
ModelAnswer:
[Kashou]: "Hmm? That... me, well, I did say my family runs a wagashi shop, but did I mention it had such a storied history?"
He'd been avoiding mentioning that his actual family business was an old-established wagashi shop when he agreed to become Beignet's disciple...
[Beignet]: "Well..."
[Shigure]: "Excuse me, Onii-sama! I wanted to inform you of the situation I'm in now."
[Kashou]: "Huh?"
[Shigure]: "I thought it was necessary to let you know, since I've been imitating you... out of respect."
[Kashou]: "No, that's fine. There wasn't any need to hide it."
[Beignet]: "Yes... I heard from Shigure about the situation."
[Kashou]: "Is that so? Oh, I'm sorry for going on too much. That was about how La Soleil has a tradition, right?"

Question:
[ベニエ]: 「私たちは結婚して、息子が生まれて……しばらくは３人で暮らしていたの」
[ベニエ]: 「その頃にね……私の作ったお菓子が、皆を笑顔にする、と息子が言ったのよ」
[ベニエ]: 「息子がママはお日様みたいだねと言ってくれた」
[ベニエ]: 「この店の名前をラ・ソレイユにしたのは、その言葉があってのことなの」
[嘉祥]: 「なるほど、そういう由来が……」
ようやくラ・ソレイユの由来が聞けて、俺は嬉しかった。
しかし、ただ幸せなだけの話ではないようだった。
[時雨]: 「……ご子息を……ご家族を愛していたのですね」
[ベニエ]: 「ええ、それはもう」
[ベニエ]: 「でも、私は日本を去らなければならなくなったの」
[ベニエ]: 「この店を継ぐ予定だった兄が、早世してしまって……」
reference_answer:
[Beignet]: 「We married, and I gave birth to a son... For a while, the three of us lived together.」
[Beignet]: 「When we did... my son told me that... my sweets put a smile on everyone's face.」
[Beignet]: 「He told me, 'Mama, you're just like the sun'.」
[Beignet]: 「The reason why I named this shop 'La Soleil' is because of my son's words.」
[Kashou]: 「I see. So that's why...」
It fills me with joy to finally find out the origin behind the name La Soleil.
However, this story doesn't seem to be leading toward a happy ever after.
[Shigure]: 「...You loved your son... You loved your family, yes?」
[Beignet]: 「Yes, that goes without saying.」
[Beignet]: 「However, I was forced to leave Japan.」
[Beignet]: 「My older brother, who was supposed to take over this pâtissièrie, died an early death...」
ModelAnswer:
[Beignet]: "We got married, had a son... and for a while we lived as three."
[Beignet]: "Back then... my son said that the sweets I made brought smiles to everyone's faces."
[Beignet]: "He called me Mama like the sun."
[Beignet]: "I named this shop La Soleil because of those words."
[Kashou]: "Ah, so there is a story behind that..."
Finally hearing the origin of La Soleil made me happy.
But it seemed like this wasn't just a simple tale of happiness.
[Minaduki Shigure]: "...Loving your child... and your family?"
[Beignet]: "Yes, that's right."
[Beignet]: "But I had to leave Japan."
[Beignet]: "My older brother who was supposed to inherit this shop passed away early..."

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Fraise (フレーズ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Beignet (ベニエ) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Mentor (師匠)
Question:
[嘉祥]: 「そんなことがあったなんて……」
[ベニエ]: 「あの頃の私は、まだ若くて、賢明ではなかったわね。いくつものことを追いかけて……」
[ベニエ]: 「失ったあとに、何が一番大切だったのか、気付いたもの」
[フレーズ]: 「家族が……一番だったのですか？」
[ベニエ]: 「そうね……私にとっての、お菓子は……息子が笑顔になってくれるものだった」
[ベニエ]: 「私が作っているお菓子は、幼い息子が美味しいと褒めてくれた味なのよ」
[ベニエ]: 「今も作り続けているのは、いつかまた息子が食べて喜んでくれるかもしれない、と思って」
[ベニエ]: 「……そういう、未練なのよ」
[嘉祥]: 「あの……ご家族は、今は……？」
下宿させてもらって、毎日のように店を手伝っていたが、電話も郵便も、家族らしき者から連絡が来たことはなかった。
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「I can't believe that's what happened...」
[Beignet]: 「I was still young back then and not wise. I tried chasing after a lot of things...」
[Beignet]: 「After I lost it all, I realized what was truly precious to me.」
[Fraise]: 「Was it... family?」
[Beignet]: 「Yes... To me, my pastries were always... something that brought a smile to my son's face.」
[Beignet]: 「The pastries I make are imbued with the flavor that my young son complimented me for.」
[Beignet]: 「I think that I still make them to this day on the off-chance that my son might eat them in joy one day.」
[Beignet]: 「...That is the regret I speak of.」
[Kashou]: 「Um... Where is your family now...?」
I lodged here with Mentor's permission and helped in the shop each day, but I don't remember a single phone call, package, or message from anyone even resembling family.
ModelAnswer:
[Kashou]: "That kind of thing could have happened…"
[Benieto]: "Back then, I was still young and not very wise. Chasing after so many things…"
[Benieto]: "I realized what was truly important only after losing it."
[Fraise]: "Was family the most important thing?"
[Benieto]: "Yes… For me, sweets were something that made my son smile."
[Benieto]: "The taste of the sweets I make is one that my young son praised as delicious."
[Benieto]: "I continue to make them because I hope that someday, my son might eat them and be happy again."
[Benieto]: "...That's just lingering regret."
[Kashou]: "Um… How about your family now? You've been staying here and helping in the shop every day, but we haven't received any calls or mail from anyone who seems like a member of your family."

metadata:
[character] Name: Fraise (フレーズ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Beignet (ベニエ) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Mentor (師匠)
Question:
[ベニエ]: 「歳を取ってから、ようやく息子の気持ちを考えることができるようになったなんてね……」
[嘉祥]: 「気持ちを考える……」
[時雨]: 「何歳になろうと、私は母様と会いたいと思っています」
[フレーズ]: 「歳なんて関係ないと思います、パティシエール」
[嘉祥]: 「俺は……やっぱり、当時の師匠が、ただ失敗したとは思えません」
[嘉祥]: 「だって、もしも師匠が日本に残って、この街でパティスリーを再開していなかったら、俺は素晴らしい洋菓子に出会えなかった」
[ベニエ]: 「……そういう考え方もあるわね」
[フレーズ]: 「わ、わたしもです！　パティシエールがいなかったら、今頃は……」
[ベニエ]: 「そうね。フレーズには出会えなかったかもしれない」
reference_answer:
[Beignet]: 「To think that I finally managed to consider my son's feelings after growing old...」
[Kashou]: 「Considering his feelings...」
[Shigure]: 「No matter how old I would get, I would want to meet my mother.」
[Fraise]: 「I don't think age matters here, Pâtissière.」
[Kashou]: 「Well, I... couldn't consider what you did at the time as a mistake.」
[Kashou]: 「I mean, if you had remained in Japan and hadn't resumed business as a patissiere here, I wouldn't have ever encountered such wonderful Western pastries.」
[Beignet]: 「...I suppose that is one way of thinking about it.」
[Fraise]: 「I-I agree! If you weren't around, Pâtissière, then we wouldn't...」
[Beignet]: 「That's true. We probably wouldn't have ever met.」
ModelAnswer:
[Beignet]: "After growing older, I've finally come to understand my son's feelings... isn't that right?"
[Minaduki Kashou]: "Understanding feelings..."
[Minaduki Shigure]: "No matter how old I get, I want to meet Mother again."
[Fraise]: "Age doesn't matter, Pastry Chef."
[Minaduki Kashou]: "I... still can't help but think that the master back then wasn't just a failure."
[Minaduki Kashou]: "Because if the master had stayed in Japan and reopened this bakery here, I wouldn't have met such wonderful pastries."
[Beignet]: "...That's one way to look at it."
[Fraise]: "W-well, that's true too! If there hadn't been a Pastry Chef..."
[Beignet]: "Right. You might not have met me either."

metadata:
[character] Name: Beignet (ベニエ) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Mentor (師匠)
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Fraise (フレーズ) | Gender: Female
Question:
[時雨]: 「だって、あんなにも大勢のお客さんが、笑顔になっていたじゃありませんか」
[ベニエ]: 「……ありがたいことにね」
[嘉祥]: 「昔の師匠が失敗したとは思えません。でも、息子さんの気持ちを考えてあげられなかったというのも事実なんだと思います」
[嘉祥]: 「だけど、息子さんが大人になっているなら、師匠の気持ちだって考えてくれるんじゃないか、って」
[ベニエ]: 「それは、私にとって都合のいい空想ではなくて？」
[嘉祥]: 「かもしれません。でも、わからないことです。だから、俺は……息子さんに会ってみるべきだと思います」
[嘉祥]: 「勝手なことを言って、すみません」
[フレーズ]: 「わたしも、お兄さんと同じように思います、パティシエール」
reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「After all, that huge crowd of people had smiles on each of their faces, did they not?」
[Beignet]: 「...Yes, thankfully.」
[Kashou]: 「I don't think  what you did in the past was a mistake, but I do think it's a fact that you couldn't take your son's feelings into consideration at the time.」
[Kashou]: 「Still, if your son is an adult now, I'm pretty sure that he's considering how you must've felt, too.」
[Beignet]: 「Isn't that just convenient wishful thinking?」
[Kashou]: 「Perhaps, but nothing is certain, which is why... I think you should give your son a visit.」
[Kashou]: 「I apologize for speaking outside my boundaries.」
[Fraise]: 「My opinion is the same as Onii-san's, Pâtissière.」
ModelAnswer:
[Shigure]: "But look, so many customers were all smiling. Wasn't that wonderful?"
[Beignet]: "……It was truly a blessing."
[Kashou]: "I can't imagine the old mentor ever failing like that. But it's also true that I couldn't have considered your feelings."
[Kashou]: "But if you've grown up, perhaps you'll consider the mentor's feelings too, won't you?"
[Beignet]: "That's just a convenient fantasy for me, isn't it?"
[Kashou]: "It might be. But I don't know. That's why I think... I should meet with you."
[Kashou]: "Sorry for speaking out of turn."
[Fraise]: "I feel the same way too, Patissier."

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Beignet (ベニエ) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Mentor (師匠)
Question:
[ベニエ]: 「もう一度、考えてみるわね？」
[嘉祥]: 「……すみません、師匠。悲しい話をさせてしまいました」
[ベニエ]: 「いえ……いつかは、話しておいたほうがいいと思っていたから」
[ベニエ]: 「貴方は道を間違えないと思うわ、嘉祥」
[嘉祥]: 「俺が、道を？　……そうだと、いいのですが」
師匠は家族と離ればなれになったことを後悔している。
俺は自分から家を出て、両親とは疎遠になっていた。
母親の誕生日に言い争いをしたっきり、一度も連絡すら取っていない。
すでに道を間違えているような気がしなくもないが……
[ベニエ]: 「今の嘉祥には、パティシエとしての実力だけじゃなく、とても大切なものが身についているもの」
reference_answer:
[Beignet]: 「But, I'll try thinking it over again, okay?」
[Kashou]: 「...Forgive me, Mentor. I didn't mean to make you tell such a sad tale.」
[Beignet]: 「No, I had been thinking I should talk about it eventually anyway.」
[Beignet]: 「I know you're on the right path, Kashou.」
[Kashou]: 「Me? On the right path? Well, I'd... certainly like to think so.」
Mentor regrets the fact that she was separated from her family.
I left my house voluntarily and became estranged from my parents.
Ever since that verbal spat I had on my mom's birthday, I haven't gotten in contact with them even once.
I'd say it definitely feels as though I'm on the wrong path, but...
[Beignet]: 「Right now, you have not only mastered the skills of a capable pâtissièr, but something else very important.」
ModelAnswer:
[Beignet]: "Let's think about it once more, okay?"
[Kashou]: "……I'm sorry, Master. I made you listen to a sad story."
[Beignet]: "No, actually… I thought it would be better to tell you someday."
[Beignet]: "I believe you won't go astray, Kashou."
[Kashou]: "Me? Going astray? …Well, if that's the case, then it's fine."
The master regrets being separated from his family.
I left home on my own and became estranged from my parents.
We argued on my mother's birthday and haven't even spoken since.
It almost feels like I've already gone astray…

Question:
[ベニエ]: 「そうね。ここで働いていた頃には、欠けていたかもしれないわね」
[ベニエ]: 「きっと、貴方の周りにいる方々によって、育まれたのでしょう」
[嘉祥]: 「俺の周りの……」
時雨を見つめる。
そして、俺はネコたちのことを思い出した。
[ベニエ]: 「今の貴方になら、きっと出来るわ」
[ベニエ]: 「気をつけて帰りなさい、嘉祥」
[嘉祥]: 「はい、それはもう」
[ベニエ]: 「時雨、来てくれて本当に嬉しかったわ」
[時雨]: 「私も、すごく貴重な経験をさせていただき、とても楽しかったです」
[フレーズ]: 「お兄さん……いろいろと、ありがとうございました」
[嘉祥]: 「俺のほうこそ、世話になったね、フレーズ」
reference_answer:
[Beignet]: 「Correct, you might have been missing it back when you were still working here.」
[Beignet]: 「No doubt it was nurtured by those you keep around you.」
[Kashou]: 「Those I keep around me...」
I stare at Shigure.
Then, I start to think about the girls.
[Beignet]: 「As you are now, I'm sure you'll do fine.」
[Beignet]: 「Have a safe trip back home, Kashou.」
[Kashou]: 「Yes, of course.」
[Beignet]: 「Shigure, I'm so glad you came along.」
[Shigure]: 「As am I. It was an invaluable experience that I thoroughly enjoyed.」
[Fraise]: 「Onii-san... Thank you so much for everything.」
[Kashou]: 「I should be the one thanking you for the hospitality, Fraise.」
ModelAnswer:
[Beignet]: "That's right. Back when I worked here, there might have been something missing."
[Beignet]: "It must have been nurtured by those around you, wasn't it?"
[Kashou]: "My surroundings...,"
he glances at Shigure.
And then, he remembers the cats.
[Beignet]: "Now that you're in this position, I'm sure you can do it."
[Beignet]: "Take care on your way home, Kashou."
[Kashou]: "Yes, of course."
[Beignet]: "Shigure, it was truly wonderful to have you here."
[Shigure]: "I too had such a precious experience and enjoyed it immensely."
[Fraise]: "Brother... thank you so much for everything."
[Kashou]: "It's actually I who've been taken care of, Fraise."

フレーズが封筒を受け取り、中を確かめる。
入っていたのは、旅行券だった。
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Hmm... It's hard to describe in words, but... I guess you could say I found what the words 'putting smiles on people's faces' really means.」
[Fraise]: 「What it really means...?」
[Fraise]: 「I don't quite understand, but I'm sure it's something important.」

[Fraise]: 「That said, I don't think I'll be getting used to cameras any time soon...」

[Fraise]: 「What is this?」
[Shigure]: 「A present. From me to you.」
Fraise takes the envelope and checks the contents.

[Fraise]: "Why?"
[Shigure]: "It's a present from me."

reference_answer:

[時雨]: 「そ、そうなんですか？」

reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「Heave...」
Shigure pulls her rather big carry-on case. Looks pretty heavy.
[Kashou]: 「This was a two-night trip by plane, which means it was roughly a one-night stay. You're packing quite the load for such a short time.」
[Shigure]: 「A girl needs many tools to keep up appearances.」
[Shigure]: 「Also, I couldn't just use the same shoes and underwear for this dress and kimono. I also needed loungewear, as well.」
[Shigure]: 「And I didn't research on how to use the French luggage delivery services.」
[Kashou]: 「Aah, I wouldn't put too much faith in getting your luggage delivered to the airport in France.」
[Shigure]: 「O-Oh, is that so?」
[Kashou]: 「Coming from personal experience... you're pretty much leaving it to chance.」
[Shigure]: 「Well, that sounds no good.」
ModelAnswer:
[Shigure]: "Nshio..."  
Shigure is pulling a large suitcase. It looks quite heavy.  
[Kashou]: "Since this time it's a two-night stay by plane, it'll be almost like a one-night trip, right? That's quite a lot of luggage, isn't it?"  
[Shigure]: "Women need all sorts of small accessories for their appearance."  
[Shigure]: "Also, I can't wear the same shoes and underwear with both this dress and kimono, so I needed house clothes as well."  
[Shigure]: "And I didn't check how to use French delivery services."  
[Kashou]: "Ah... It might be better not to rely too much on French delivery services."  
[Shigure]: "Is that... really the case?"  
[Kashou]: "From my personal experience, I think it depends on luck."  
[Shigure]: "That would be troublesome..."

[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
[嘉祥]: 「時雨、大変なら持ってあげるから、無理をする前に言ってくれよ？」
[時雨]: 「あ……」
[時雨]: 「兄様、ちょっと変わりましたね……」
[嘉祥]: 「えっ、重たい荷物を運んでいる妹を気遣うくらい、今までだってしただろ？」
[嘉祥]: 「そんなに薄情な人間ではなかったと思うぞ。むしろ、お節介なくらいで……」
[時雨]: 「はい。今も昔も、兄様はとっても優しくて、素敵です」
[時雨]: 「でも、以前なら、私の言葉を待つことなく、重そうだから持ってあげるよと言うかと思います」
[嘉祥]: 「そう、かな……？」
[時雨]: 「それはそれで、とても嬉しいことですし、私は感謝したと思いますが」
[時雨]: 「でも、今の兄様は、私に判断を任せてくれました」
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Shigure, I can take that for you if it's too much, so just ask before you break your back.」
[Shigure]: 「Oh...」
[Shigure]: 「Nii-sama, I think you've changed a bit...」
[Kashou]: 「Huh? Looking out for my little sister carrying a bunch of heavy luggage isn't something new for me, is it?」
[Kashou]: 「I don't think that I've ever been THAT heartless before. Actually, I just might dote a little too much...」
[Shigure]: 「Yes. Past and present, you've always been a kind and wonderful person.」
[Shigure]: 「But, in the past, I feel as though you wouldn't wait for me to say anything and you would just say, 'Hey, that looks heavy; I'll take that off your hands'.」
[Kashou]: 「Oh, would I...?」
[Shigure]: 「That being the case, it's an extremely kind gesture, and I would appreciate it.」
[Shigure]: 「However, you seem to let me make the decision for myself now.」
ModelAnswer:
[Kashou]: "Shigure, if it's too much, I'll take it for you. Let me know before you push yourself too hard, okay?"
[Shigure]: "Ah..."
[Shigure]: "Brother, you seem a bit different lately..."
[Kashou]: "Huh? Haven't I always been concerned about my sister carrying heavy loads?"
[Kashou]: "I don't think you were that heartless before. On the contrary, you were quite overprotective..."
[Shigure]: "Yes. Then and now, brother has always been so kind and wonderful."
[Shigure]: "But before, I would have expected you to just take it for me without waiting for my words, thinking it looked heavy."
[Kashou]: "Hmm... maybe?"
[Shigure]: "That was really a happy thing, and I do feel grateful. But now brother has left the judgment up to me."

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
[時雨]: 「きっと自覚はないのでしょう。ちょっとした変化です。兄様マニアの私でなければ、見逃してしまいますわ」
[嘉祥]: 「お、おう……」
俺自身のことなのに、妹のほうが把握しているというのも、どうかと思うが……
[時雨]: 「ここ数日のことだけでなく……きっと、これまでの日々の積み重ねが、兄様を変えたのでしょうね」
[嘉祥]: 「俺は何も変わったつもりはないけれど、時雨が言うのなら、変わったのかもしれない」
ネコたちと過ごした日々があって、師匠の言葉があって、今の俺が形作られているのだろう。
[嘉祥]: 「まぁ、師匠があれだけの話をしてくれたんだ。俺だって少しは学ぶさ」
[時雨]: 「学びはありましたか？」
[嘉祥]: 「たぶんな。俺も、自分が洋菓子を作る理由を考えてみたよ」
reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「You probably don't realize it yourself since it's such a minor change. If I weren't such a Nii-sama fanatic, I would have overlooked it myself.」
[Kashou]: 「U-Uh, sure...」
Not sure how I feel about my sister being able to pick up on something about me better than... well, me.
[Shigure]: 「I'm sure that the past few days alone haven't changed you... but rather, the culmination of the days leading up until now have.」
[Kashou]: 「I don't really think I've changed any, but maybe I did if you say so.」
The days I spent with the girls, my mentor's words— all those things have probably helped shape the person I am now.
[Kashou]: 「Well, Mentor was willing to share that much of her story with me. I could learn a thing or two myself.」
[Shigure]: 「Were you able to learn anything?」
[Kashou]: 「Yeah, I think. I tried thinking of my own reasons for pastry-making.」
ModelAnswer:
[Shigure]: "She must be unaware of it. It's just a slight change. If I weren't a maniac for my older brother, I might have missed it."
[Kashou]: "Eh... um..."
Even though she knows me better than anyone else, it feels odd to think that...
[Shigure]: "Not just these past few days... surely all the little things that have accumulated over time have changed my older brother, haven't they?"
[Kashou]: "I don't feel like I've changed at all, but if Shigure says so, maybe I have."
Days spent with the cats and words from my master—that's how I am now.
[Kashou]: "Well, Master gave me such a great talk. Even I should learn something from it."
[Shigure]: "Did you actually learn anything?"
[Kashou]: "Probably. I also tried to think about why I make western pastries."
